description: Information about any biological material that was generated/used in the project including everything from a whole organism to subcellular components.
title: Biomaterial core
name: biomaterial_core

describedBy.description: The URL reference to the schema.

schema_version.description: The version number of the schema in major.minor.patch format.

biomaterial_id.description: A unique ID for the biomaterial.

biomaterial_name.description: A short, descriptive name for the biomaterial that need not be unique.

biomaterial_description.description: A general description of the biomaterial.

supplementary_files.description: A list of filenames of biomaterial-level supplementary files.

biosamples_accession.guidelines: Enter accession if sample has been archived. Accession can be from the DDBJ, NCBI, or EMBL-EBI and must start with SAMD, SAMN, or SAME, respectively.

insdc_sample_accession.description: An International Nucleotide Sequence Database Collaboration (INSDC) sample accession.
insdc_sample_accession.guidelines: Enter accession if sample has been archived. Accession can be from the DDBJ, NCBI, or EMBL-EBI and must start with DRS, SRS, or ERS, respecitvely.

HDBR_accession.description: A Human Developmental Biology Resource (HDBR) sample accession.
HDBR_accession.guidelines: Enter accession if sample has been obtained from the Human Developmental Biology Resource (HDBR).
